item.description:
This Saturday June 2 at 1pm, meet at a cafe to chat!

New Assistant Organizer Dan suggests meeting at Au Bon Pain outdoor cafe, in Harvard Square next to the T station. Tea and coffee and snacks available for purchase.
Location: 1360 Mass Ave, Cambridge 617-497-9797 for directions
He will sit at the outside tables, near the edge. If it rains, go inside!

This is an informal meeting to practice speaking English with others. If it's a good time for everyone, we can have more frequent meetings. When you RSVP let us know if this is a good time!

Thanks Dan!

Reece

(PS NOT meeting on the Charles River, the website wont let me change it! )

group.name: The Boston English as a Second Language Meetup Group

item.name: Sat. 1p Cafe chat at AuBon Pain Harvard Sq, Cambridge
